    • Method Detail

      • detectLicenses

        public static Collection<License> detectLicenses​(BufferedReader reader,
                                                 LicenseStoreData licenseStoreData)
                                          throws IOException
        Tries to detect a license from a text.

        This algorithm can detect multiple licenses in the same file.

        Problem with the old version: it detects only one license per file. If a file contains more than one license, only one is detected. This version tries to detect all licenses. However, it currently does not handle well the versions. If the license name and the version are on different lines (see example below), the default version is used. In some cases, this leads to detecting Apache 1.0 as well as Apache 2.0 from the same file, while only apache 2.0 is named in the file. So the logic should be extended to use version in nearby lines. --- Apache License Version 2.0, January 2004 ---
        Parameters:
        reader - text input
        licenseStoreData -
        Returns:
        the license or an empty collection if none was detected
        Throws:
        IOException - signals that an I/O exception has occurred

      • mapNpmLicenseName

        public static List<License> mapNpmLicenseName​(String npmLicenseName,
                                              LicenseStoreData licenseStoreData)
        Obtains licenses from the license name mapping.
        Parameters:
        npmLicenseName - a license name
        licenseStoreData -
        Returns:
        a list of licenses for the name. An empty list if the license could not be mapped.

      • handleLicenseUrl

        public static boolean handleLicenseUrl​(String licenseUrl,
                                       Archive archive,
                                       String licenseFileName,
                                       LicenseStoreData licenseStoreData,
                                       ILFLog log)
        Tries to find licenses by license URL and associate them with an archive.
        Parameters:
        licenseUrl - a license URL
        archive - an archive
        licenseFileName - the file name to record as the file the license is found in
        licenseStoreData - the license store
        log - a logger
        Returns:
        true if licenses have been added to the archive, false otherwise
